text: Qayyum Chowdhury (, March 9, 1932 - November 30, 2014) was a Bangladeshi painter. He was known for painting cover photos. He painted covers for over 26 years. His works can be seen all over Bangladesh. On November 30, 2014, Chowdhury fell sick while delivering his speech on the fourth-day of Bengal Foundation organized classical music festival in Bangladesh Army Stadium. He was rushed to CMH, where the on-duty doctor declared him dead.Artist Qayyum Chy passes away He was 82 years old. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Bangladeshi painters Category:People from Chittagong Division
title: Qayyum Chowdhury
